entities.name: platform nine and three-quarters
entities.description: The platform where Harry Potter boards the Hogwarts Express. ("T HE  JOURNEY  FROM  PLATFORM  NINE  AND  THREE-QUARTERS 73")

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a person who was kissed by the mother on the cheek. ("She kissed Percy on the cheek and he left.")

entities.name: the twins
entities.description: The twins are two people who were spoken to by their mother. (‘Now , you two – this year, you behave yourselves.")

entities.name: ronniekins
entities.description: Ronniekins is a nickname for Ron Weasley. (‘Don’t worry , ickle Ronniekins is safe with us.")

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a person who was spoken to by his mother and has a pink nose. (‘Shut up,’ said Ron again.)

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a boy who was met on the train by Ginny. (‘Hey , Mum, guess what? Guess who we just met on the train?’)

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a girl who wants to see Harry Potter on the train. (‘Oh, Mum, can I go on the train and see him, Mum, oh please ...’)

entities.name: the black-haired boy
entities.description: The black-haired boy is a person who was near Ginny in the station. (‘You know that black-haired boy who was near us in the station? Know who he is?’)

relationships.description: The mother told the twins to look after Ron. (‘It’s not funny . And look after Ron.")
Ginny met Harry Potter on the train. (‘Hey , Mum, guess what? Guess who we just met on the train?’)
The mother kissed Percy on the cheek. ("She kissed Percy on the cheek and he left.")
Ginny saw Harry Potter on the train. (‘Oh, Mum, can I go on the train and see him, Mum, oh please ...’)
